markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elite Dracomancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1282) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Dracomancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1280)

</column>

---

Your magic rivals that of lesser dragons. Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as [_paralyze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=213) and [_stinking cloud_](/Spells.aspx?ID=309) for a [black dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=165) exemplar). Links to all types of dragons can be found [here](/Traits.aspx?ID=50). You can cast each of these spells once per day as arcane innate spells.
name: Elite Dracomancer

Choose one 3rd-level spell and one 4th-level spell from those listed for a dragon spellcaster of your draconic exemplar's type (such as paralyze and stinking cloud for a black dragon exemplar).
